Package Entities

Class Table

java.lang.Object
Entities.Table
public class Table extends Object
Represents a Table in the restaurant.

2021-11-12
Version:

    • setMaxNumSeats

      public void setMaxNumSeats​(int maxSeats)
      Changes the number of seats of this Table. If the new value for the number of seats is odd, it will ask the user to input an even number.
      Parameters:
      maxSeats - This Table's new value for number of seats.
